channel.title: Changing the color of PKing skulls to WHITE?
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332597.msg2594440.html#msg2594440
I posted it in the Help Section and right after I posted I relalised there was a CLIENT section.
Anyways, here is the description I used,
(If you want to see the 'progress' that I made with the topic, then disuss on the link above)
Hi!
I am working on a server but I am doing only the client, the owner codes all server-based things related. I am almost done with the client but I need to do ONE MORE THING.
I need to make it so the Pking skull is white not a brownish transparant.
Here is how my skull looks right now. [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj23/FfsDied/BadMrSkull.jpg[/img]
I want the skull to look AS IF IT DOES IN REAL RUNESCAPE, WHITE!
Please tell me where to edit, and if it requires a new sprite, please post it here as well. I honestly appreciate ANY help/feedback greatly!
Thanks!

item.title: Changing the color of PKing skulls to WHITE?
item.dc:creator: @ZYG ZYG
item.description:
@ZYG wrote:

The client automatically makes pure white transparent, change the base of the skull to a colour slightly off pure white. I had this problem too

Read full topic
